channel.title: Roman Hillje - Data Visualization & Bioinformatics
channel.description: Recent content on Roman Hillje - Data Visualization & Bioinformatics

item.title: Visualizing resources managed by a PBS job scheduler
item.description: At the research institute I currently work at, we use PBS as a job scheduler for collaborative use and research management of the HPC cluster. Just for a little background info, the cluster consists of 14 computers which are connected to make the cluster.

item.title: Porting PAGA results from scanpy to R
item.description: Seurat and scanpy are both great frameworks to analyze single-cell RNA-seq data, the main difference being the language they are designed for. Most of the methods frequently used in the literature are available in both toolkits and the workflow is essentially the same.
